src_text: Kabinete e ne e tshwere kopano ya yona ka Laboraro la bo, 23 Motsheganong 2018, kwa Tuynhuys, Motsekap
trg_text: Cabinet met on Wednesday, 23 May 2018, at Tuynhuys, Cape Tow Issues in the environment1.

src_text: Merero ya ga Jaanong1.
trg_text: Messages18.

src_text: Tirisodikgoka e e Totileng Batho ba Bong jo bo Rileng (GBV) Kabinete e kgalema ka mafoko a a bogale tota tirisodikgoka mo basading le mo banenDikgetse tsa se eng tse di akaretsa ya Nonkululeko Mpanza le Nompumelelo Mhlongo kwa Thokoza, Ekurhuleni; Katlego Joja kwa Mamelodi, Tshwane; Promise Mthembu kwa KwaZulu-Natal; le Jabulile Nhlapo, yo e leng moithuti wa kwa Unisa, di bontsha ka fao tirisodikgoka e e tshosetsang matshelo a basadi le bana ba rona e godileng ka ten
trg_text: Gender-Based Violence (GBV) Cabinet strongly condemns the violence against women and childre The most recent cases of Nonkululeko Mpanza and Nompumelelo Mhlongo in Thokoza, Ekurhuleni; Katlego Joja in Mamelodi, Tshwane; Promise Mthembu in KwaZulu-Natal; and Jabulile Nhlapo, the Unisa student, brings into sharp focus the level of violence that threatens the lives of our women and childre Cabinet expresses its deepest condolences to the families and friends of these women and childre The issue of crime against women and children requires all of us to actively be involved in fighting i

src_text: Kabinete e rometse matshediso a yona a kutlobotlhoko kwa malapeng le ditsaleng tsa basadi le bana ban Matsapa a tirisodikgoka mo basading le mo baneng a batla gore
trg_text: Cabinet calls on parents, guardians and communities to work with law-enforcement agencies to protect our childre Cabinet reiterates that if you suspect your child is missing, you must immediately report to your nearest police statio We must work together as a peace-loving and law-abiding society to tackle all crimes against women and childre Cabinet calls on those aware of any crimes against children to contact the toll-free Childline on 0800 055 555 or Crime Stop on 086 0010111.

src_text: botlhe re samagane le one mo go a lwantshen Kabinete e tsweletse go matlafatsa ditheo tsa tiragatso ya molao mo go lwantsheng phediso ya GB Mo Melaotlhomong e e atlenegisitsweng mo Kabineteng eno ke Molaotlhomo o o Kwalololwang Se wa wa Tsamaiso ya Dithulaganyo tsa Bosenyi, 1977 (Molao wa bo 51 wa 1977).
trg_text: Cabinet continues to strengthen law-enforcement agencies in the fight to stop GB Amongst the Bills approved in this last Cabinet is the Criminal Procedure Amendment Bill of 2018, which amends the Criminal Procedure Act, 1977 (Act 51 of 1977).

src_text: Molaotlhomo ono o tla oketsa ditiragalo tseo di bonwang e le ditlolotsamolao tsa thobalano tseo di tla t hot hisiwang mme gape o tla oketsa le nako e e beilweng ya go ka tlhatlhela kgetse ya thobalano go isiwa kwa kgotlatshekelo go ka nna paka e e fetang dingwaga di le 20.
trg_text: The Bill will extend the list of sexual offences in respect of the prosecution and significantly it will allow the sexual cases to go before courts even after 20 year

src_text: Ditsereganyo tseno di tlaleletsa mo godimo ga dikgato tseo puso e setseng e di tser Go setse go butswe Ditikwatikwe tsa Tlhokomelo tsa Thuthuzela di le 54 go ralala le naga tseo maitlhomo a tsona e leng go dira jaaka lefelo la ditirelontsi go ka fedisa go sotla ka batswasetlhabelo ba dikgetse tsa thobalano ka go ba isa kwa godimo le kwa tlase mmogo le go fokotsa nako e e tseiwang mo go konosetseng dikgetse tse di mabapi le tlolomolao ya thobalan Puso e setse e tlhomile Dikgotlatshekelo tsa Ditlolomolao tsa Thobalano go ka samagana ka tolamo le tirisodikgoka le petelelo e e diragalelang basad Mo godimo ga foo, Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) e tlhomile mafelotiriso a le 1 047 ao a ikaeletseng go ka thusa batswasetlhabelo kwa ditei eneng tsa sepodisi go ralala le naga go ka amogela le go thusa batswasetlhabelo ba GB Beke ya Tshireletso ya Bana e tla tshwarwa go tloga ka la bo 27 Motsheganong go fitlha ka la bo 2 Seetebosigo 2018.
trg_text: These interventions add to a number of measures that government has already put in plac A total of 54 Thuthuzela Care Centres across the country have been opened to serve as a one-stop facility to reduce secondary victimisation and reduce the time of finalising sexual case Government has set up 75 dedicated Sexual Offences Courts to deal decisively with sexual violence against wome Furthermore, the South African Police Service has established 1 047 dedicated facilities for victims at police stations countrywide to accommodate and assist victims of GB Child Protection Week will be held from 27 May to 2 June 2018.

src_text: Kabinete e ikuela mo batsading, batlhokomeding ba bana ba semolao mmogo le baagi gore ba dirisane le ditheo tsa tiragatso ya molao mo go sireletseng bana ba ron Kabinete e ikgata motlhala gore fa e le gore o belaela gore ngwana wa gago a ka tswa a latlhegile, o tshwanetse go bula kgetse ka ponyo ya leitlho kwa setei eneng sa mapodis
trg_text: The PSEC will provide political oversight and strategic managemen Amongst its focus will be to strengthen the governing framework of the SOEs and ensure that specific interventions are implemented to stabilise these companieThe membership of PSEC will comprise relevant Ministers, experts, labour and civil societ The names of the members of the PSEC will be announced at a later stag The PSEC will build on work done by the IMC

src_text: Re tshwanetse go dirisana mmogo jaaka set haba se se ratang kagiso e bile se obamela melao go ka samagana le tlolomolao e e diriwang mo basading le mo banen Kabinete e ikuela mo go bao ba itseng ka ditiragalo dingwe le dingwe fela tsa tlolomolao e e diragalelang basadi le bana go ka ikgokaganya lemogala o o sa duelelweng wa Mogala wa Merero ya Thuso ya Bana mo go
trg_text: Cabinet calls on all of us to work together to do more to prevent violence against women and children, support survivors of abuse and bring perpetrators to justic It is the duty of everyone to report those who hurt, exploit and abuse women and children so that the perpetrators can be arrested and convicted EconomyCabinet welcomes the positive growth in employment of two hundred and six thousand jobs reflected in the first quarter of 2018, from the latest Quarterly Labour Force Survey released by Statistics South Afric The upswing in employment was driven by increases in six of the 10 industrie The unemployment rate amongst our young people, however, remains high at 5, with an absorption rate of only 1.

trg_text: Cabinet approved that the necessary correspondence be sent to the National Council of Provinces and that communication with the relevant stakeholders in North West should take plac The investigative work of the Justice, Crime Prevention and Security Cluster to continue on all those matters that require the law-enforcement agencies to intervene International relations Cabinet condemned in the strongest terms the acts of violent aggression carried out by Israeli armed forces along the Gaza border, which led to the deaths of a large number of civilian Given the indiscriminate and grave manner of the latest Israeli attack, the South African government made a decision to recall Ambassador Sisa Ngombane until further notic Cabinet calls on the Israeli Defence Force to withdraw from the Gaza Strip and bring to an end the violent and destructive incursions into Palestinian territorie Their routine actions present yet another obstacle to a permanent resolution to the conflict, which must come in the form of two states, Palestine and Israel, existing side-by-side and in peac Cabinet reiterates calls made by several member states of the United Nations for an independent inquiry into the killings, with a view to hold those responsible accountable Cash-In-Transit (CIT) heistsCabinet is deeply concerned by the resurgence of CIT heists and rejects this blatant criminalit We further commend law-enforcement agencies for their swift response in apprehending suspects and thank members of the public who assisted law enforcers with these arrestMembers of the public who may have prior information are urged to lend a hand and contact the law-enforcement agencie Cabinet decisions7.

o o rotloediwang ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa mo Puong ya gagwe ya ntlha ya Maemo a Set haba (SoNA) ka Tlhakole 2018, Kabinete e ikuela mo go maAforika Borwa otlhe, bogolosegolo mo makaleng a poraefete, go thusa go mo go tlhomeng ditiro le mo go beeletseng ka fo nageng gore
trg_text: inspired by President Cyril Ramaphosa in his maiden State of the Nation Address in February 2018, Cabinet calls on all South Africans, in particular the private sector, to help create jobs and invest locally so that more South Africans can be drawn into the economy EnergyCabinet welcomes as a milestone the launch of the Xina Solar One Concentrated Solar Power Project in the Northern Cap It is one of seven Concentrated Solar Power Projects under the Department of Energy s Renewable Energy Independent Power Producer Procurement ProgrammThe Xina Solar One plant will provide clean energy to Eskom under a 20-year power purchase agreemen This will translate into 95 000 South African households receiving clean energy, especially during peak hours North West Cabinet received a second report from the Inter-Ministerial Committee (IMC) on North West and is satisfied with the progress in stabilizing the provinc In its previous meeting, Cabinet approved that North West be placed under Section 100 (1) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996.

trg_text: Nelson Mandela Africa Day Centenary LecturePresident Ramaphosa will deliver the Nelson Mandela Africa Day Centenary Lecture at the Africa Renaissance Conference, on 24 May 2018 at the Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre in DurbaThe event forms part of the yearlong centenary commemorations of the lives of our first democratic President, Tata Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela and Struggle icon Mama Albertina Nontsikelelo Sisulu, which are taking place across the continent and the glob Africa DayAfrica Day is held annually on 25 May across the continent to mark the founding of the then Organisation of African Unity

trg_text: The amendments give effect to the South Gauteng High court judgement in the Levenstein casThe case declared Section 18 of the Criminal Procedure Act of 1977 inconsistent with the Constitution and invalid to the extent that it bars, in all circumstances, the right to institute a prosecution for all sexual offences, other than those listed in section 18 (f), (h) and (i) of this Act after the lapse of 20 years from the time when the offence was committeThe amendments will allow the National Prosecuting Authority wider discretion to institute prosecutions in sexual offences in accordance with Chapter 2 of the Constitutio Upcoming events16.

src_text: Bokone Bophirima
trg_text: Department of Touris

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse pegelo ya bobedi ya Komiti ya Ditona tsa Naga (IMC) e e ka ga matsapa a a tsweletseng kwa Bokone Bophirima mme e kgotsofaditswe ke kgatelopele e e dirilweng mo go direng gore porofense eno e nne mo seemong se se edilen
trg_text: Presidential State-Owned Enterprise Council (PSEC)Cabinet approved the establishment of the PSEC to be chaired by President Ramaphos The broad terms of reference is to reposition the state-owned enterprises (SOEs) as effective instruments of economic developmen

src_text: Mo kopanong ya yona e e fetileng, Kabinete e utlwane ka gore Bokone Bophirima bo beewe mo taolong ya Karolo ya bo 100 (1) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ya 1996.
trg_text: SOE that was formed in February 2015, chaired by the Deputy President Cabinet approved the Intellectual Property (IP) Policy of the Republic of South Africa-Phase 1.

src_text: Kabinete gape e okeditse Ditokololo tsa IMC ka go tlaleletsa ka Tona ya Thuto ya Motheo (DBE); ya Bodiredipuso le Tsamaiso (DPSA); ya Manno a Batho; ya Tlhabololo ya Loago; ya Bojanala; ya Merero ya Tikologo le ya Dipalangw
trg_text: Cabinet also increased the members of IMC with the Ministers of Basic Education; Public Service and Administration; Human Settlements; Social Development; Tourism; Environmental Affairs and Transpor

src_text: IMC e ne ya kopiwa go dira gape diphuruphutso tse di tseneletseng mo porofenseng le go eletsa Kabinete gore mo mafapheng a puso a a leng teng ga jaana ke afe a a tshwanetsweng go beewa ka fa tlase ga taolo ya Karolo ya bo 100 (1) (a) kgotsa Karolo ya bo 100 (1) (b) ya Molaothe
trg_text: Cabinet approved the Medical Schemes Amendment Bill of 2018 to be published in the Government Gazette for public commentThe Bill amends the Medical Schemes Act of 1998 (Act 131 of 1998) to align it with the National Health Insurance (NHI) White Paper and the Draft NHI Fund Bil The Bill seeks, amongst others, to improve the regulation of the medical schemes industry and to also align the regulatory framework to the changes that have taken place over the past decade in the sectoThis Bill will also ensure that beneficiaries are better protected and promotes better access to private-health fundin Cabinet approved the introduction of the State Liability Amendment Bill of 2018 to Parliamen The Bill amends the State Liability Act of 1957.

src_text: Ka ntlha ya tiro eno, Kabinete e amogetse gore mafapha a le matlhano a porofense a bewe ka fa tlase ga taolo ya Karolo ya bo 100 (1) (b) : (1) Kantoro ya Tonakgolo; (2) Lefapha la Pabalesego ya Baagi le
trg_text: Department of Finance, Economy and Enterprise Development;(2).

src_text: Bolaodi jwa Dipalangwa;(3) Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo le Tlhabololo ya Metshameko; (4) Lefapha la Boitekanelo; le (5) Lefapha la Ditiro tsa Puso le Ditsel Mafapha a le matlhano a tla bewa ka fa tlase ga taolo ya Karolo ya bo 100 (1) (a):(1) Lefapha la Matlole, Ikonomi le Tlhabololo Temothuo;(2) Lefapha la Pusoselegae le Bonno jwa Batho; (3) Lefapha la Metseselegae, Tikologo le Tlhabololo ya Temothuo;(4) Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Loago; mmogo le(5) Lefapha la Bojanal
trg_text: Department of Rural, Environment and Agricultural Development;(4).

src_text: Kabinete e letleletse gore dikgokagano tse di tlhokegang di romelwe kwa Lekgotleng la Boset haba la Diporofense (NCOP) le gore ditlhaeletsano le bannaleseabe ba ba matshwanedi kwa Bokone Bophirima di simolol Dipatlisiso tse di tsweletseng go diriwa ke Setlhopha sa Bosiamisi, Thibelobosenyi le Tshireletsego di se emisewe mo mererong yotlhe eo e tlhokang gore ditheo tsa tiragatso ya molao di tsereganye gone Kamano ya Bodit habat haba Kabinete e kgalemetse ka mafoko a a bogale ditiragalo tsa dikgoka tse di diriwang ke sesole sa maIseraele mo molelwaneng wa Gaza, tseo di bolaileng mat hwitit hwiti a baag Go lebeletswe bogale mmogo le mokgwa wa ditlhaselo tseno tsa se weng tsa puso ya maIseraele, puso ya maAforika Borwa e sweditse gore e laele Moambasatara wa yona Sisa Ngombane gore a boele fa gae fo fitlha a laelwa gore a ka nne a boela kwa nageng e
trg_text: The policy has incorporated inputs from the stakeholder s submissions and representation It responds to the National Development Plan s (NDP) call for greater emphasis on innovation, improved productivity and more intense pursuit of a knowledge economThe IP Policy Phase I is informed among others by the Constitution, the NDP, the National Drug Master Plan, the National Industrial Policy Framework and the various iterations of the Industrial Policy Action PlaIt will serve as an important policy instrument in promoting innovation, technology transfer, research and development, creative expression, consumer protection, industrial development and more broadly, economic growth Cabinet approved the ratification of the Treaty on the Prohibition of Nuclear Weapons by Parliamen The Treaty is the culmination of humanitarian initiative on nuclear weapons launched in 2010.

src_text: Kabinete e ikuela mo Sesoleng sa maiseraele go tswa mo Molelwaneng wa Gaza le go busetsa maemo a dintwa le ditshenyo tsa dithoto tsa mafelo a Palestina mo seken Dikgato tsa bona di tlhagisa gape sekgoreletsi mo tharabololong ya leruri e e setseng e tserwe mabapi le dikgogakgogano tseno, e e tshwanetseng go dira dinaga di le pedi e leng naga ya Palestina le naga ya Iseraele, tseo di tla tshegetsanang le go rena kagis
trg_text: It is a strategic intervention in the area of nuclear disarmament and the long-standing impasse in multilateral nuclear disarmament negotiationThe Treaty is fully aligned to South Africa s long-standing disarmament policies, domestic legislation and international obligation Cabinet approved the Amendment to the Convention on the Physical Protection of Nuclear Material, to be tabled in ParliamenThe Convention on the Physical Protection of Nuclear Material is the only legally binding international instrument in the area of physical protection of nuclear materia The amended convention is an important milestone in international efforts to improve the physical protection of nuclear materials and facilities by setting common standards of protectioIt covers among others, the physical protection of nuclear material in domestic use, storage and transport, and the protection of nuclear materials and facilities against sabotag Cabinet approved the co-hosting of the 10th International Conference of the Ombud s Institutions of the Armed Forces, by the Office of the Military Ombud, which is scheduled for October 2018.This is an annual event organised by the Centre for the Democratic Control of the Armed Forces, based in Geneva, Switzerland, and will for the first time be co-hosted in Afric Bills12.

src_text: Kabinete e boeletsa boikuelo jo bo setseng bo dirilwe ke dinaga di le dintsinyana tseo di leng ditokololo tsa Dinagakopano jwa go dira diphuruphutso tse di mabapi le dipolao tseno, go ka rwesa ba ba amegang mo go tsona maikarabelo Go Kgothosiwa ga Dijanaga tse di Thotang Madi (CIT)Kabinete e tshwenyegile e le ruri ka ga ditlhaselo tsa
trg_text: CondolencesCabinet expressed condolences to the family and friends of the late veteran photographer and recipient of the National Order of Ikhamanga, Mr Sam Nzima, who used his camera to expose the brutality of apartheid rul He will be remembered for his iconic photograph of Hector Pieterson

src_text: go kgothosiwa ga dijanaga tse di thotang madi mme e kgatlhanong le bogodu jon Re akgola gape le ditheo tsa tiragatso ya molao mo tiragatsong ya bona e e bonako mo go golegeng babelaelwa le go leboga baagi ba ba thusitseng badiragatsi ba molao ka tshedimosetso e e thusitseng mo go golegeng batho ban Baagi bao ba ka tswang ba na le tshedimosetso e nngwe go ikuelwa mo go bone gore ba ka thusa ka go ikgolaganya le ditheo tsa tiragatso ya mola Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete7.
trg_text: on the budgets of public hospitalThese amendments will increase the financial resources available to provincial hospitals to provide healthcare service Cabinet approved the publication of the National Climate Change Bill of 2018 for public commen The Bill allows for the alignment of policies that influence South Africa s climate change respons It will ensure, the country s transition to a lower carbon and climate resilient economThis is an additional step in South Africa s efforts to implement the National Climate Change Response Policy to promote sustainable development and fulfil the right to an environment that is not harmful to health or well-being, as enshrined in our Constitutio Cabinet approved the introduction of the Criminal Procedure Amendment Bill of 2018, which amends the Criminal Procedure Act of 1977 into ParliamenThe proposed Amendment Bill will extend the list of sexual offences in respect of the prosecution and significantly it allows for the charges to be instituted even after 20 year

src_text: Lekgotla la Moporesitente le le mabapi le dikgwebo tsa PusoKabinete e amogetse gore go tlhomiwa PSEC eo monnasetilo wa yona e leng Moporesitente Ramaphos Maitlhomomagolo a yona ke go baakanyase wa Dikgwebo tsa Puso (di-SOE) go nna didirisiwa tse di botlhokwa thata mo tlhabololong ya ikonom

src_text: SOE e setseng e e dirile go tloga ka Tlhakole 2015 fa e ne e tlhomiwa, eo monnasetilo wa yona e neng e le Motlatsamoporesitente Kabinete e amogetse Pholisi Dithoto le Dithata (IP)
trg_text: on 16 June 1976, which forced the world to take notice and act against the brutal apartheid regimCabinet extends its deepest sadness and condolences to the family of Dr Phillip Nchipi Tabane, who passed on after a long illness on 18 May 2018.

src_text: ya Kgato ya 1 ya Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borw Pholisi eno e bokeleditse ditshwaelo tse di tlhagisitsweng mmogo le tseo di emetseng bannaleseab E tsibogela boikuelo jwa Leano la Tlhabololo la Boset haba (NDP) jwa go gatelela thata boitshimololedi, tlhagiso e e tokafaditsweng mmogo le tshalomorago e e tseneletseng ya khumo ya kitsPholisi ya IP ya Kgato ya 1 gareng ga tse dingwe e latela Molaotheo, NDP, Leano la Botlhokwa la Diritibatsi la Boset haba, Letlhomeso la Naga la Pholisi ya Diintaseteri mmogo le dikwalwa tse dingwe tse di farologaneng tsa Leanotiro la Pholisi ya Diintaseter Gape pholisi eno e tla nna sedirisiwa se se botlhokwa thata mo go rotloetseng boitshimololedi, phetisetso ya thekenoloji, dipatlisiso le tlhabololo, go itlhagisa ka mokgwa wa botaki, tshireletsego ya bareki, tlhabololo ya diintaseteri mmogo ka bogolo le, kgolo ya ikonomi Kabinete e amogetse go baakanngwa ga Tumelano e e mabapi le go Ganetsiwa ga go dira Dibetsa tsa Nyutlelia ke Palament Tumelano eno ke kgato ya botho mo dibetseng tsa nyutlelia e e thankgolotsweng ka 2010.

src_text: Ke tsereganyo ya togamaano mo kgaolong ya go fokotsa dibetsa tsa nyutlelia le mo dikgogakgonanong tse di tswang kwa lowe tse di mabapi le dipuisano tsa dinagantsi tsa go fokotsa dibetsa tsenTumelano eno e tsamaisana ka botlalo le dipholisi tsa Aforika Borwa tsa go fokotsa dibetsa, melao ya ka fa nageng le maikano a yona a bodit habat hab Kabinete e amogetse gore go Baakanngwe Tumelano e e ka ga go Babalela ka Namana Didirisiwa tsa Nyutlelia, gore e tlhagisiwe kwa Palamenten Tumelano e e ka ga go Babalela ka Namana Didirisiwa tsa Nyutlelia ke sedirisiwa se le nosi fela se se bofelelang mo kgaolong ya Tumelano e e ka ga go pabalelo ka namana ya didirisiwa tsa nyutleli Tumelano e e baakantsweng ke phitlhelelo e e botlhokwa mo matekong a bodit habat haba mo go babaleleng ka namana didirisiwa tsa nyutlelia mmogo le mafelo a tsona ka go tlhoma dikgato tsa setlwaedi tsa pabaleseg Gareng ga tse dingwe e akaretsa pabaleseg ka namana ya didirisiwa tsa nyutlelia mo go dirisiweng mo teng ga naga, mo mafelong a polokelo ya yona le mo dipalangweng tsa go e rwala, mmogo le pabalelo ya didirisiwa tsa nyutlelia mmogo le mafelo a yona kgatlhanong le tshenyo ya kabom 11.

src_text: Kabinete e dumeletse go tshwarammogo marapo ga Khonferense ya Bodit habat haba ya bo 10 ya Setheo sa Moombata wa Sesole gore e tshwarwe ke Kantoro ya Moombata wa Sesole, e e tla tshwarwang ka Diphalane 2018.

src_text: Ono ke mokete wa ngwaga le ngwaga o o rulaganngwang ke Tikwatikwe ya Taolo ya Temokerasi ya Sesole, e e leng kwa Geneva, Switzerland, mme jaanong e tla bo e le lekgetlho la ntlha o tshwarelwa mo kontinenteng ya Aforik Melaotlhomo12.

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse Dipaakanyo tsa Molaotlhomo wa Sekema sa Tlhokomelo ya Boitekanelo wa 2018 gore di phasaladiwe mo Kaseteng ya Puso gore baagi ba dire ditshwael Molaotlhomo ono o baakanya Molao wa Sekema sa Tlhokomelo ya Boitekanelo wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 131 wa 1998) gore o tsamaelane le
trg_text: Department of Community Safety and Transport Management;(3).

src_text: Lokwalotemoso lwa lefapha la puso lwa In orense ya Boset haba ya Boitekanelo (NHI) mmogo le Sekwalwa sa Bili ya Tlamelokamatlole a NH Molaotlhomo ono, gareng ga tse dingwe, o ikaelela go tokafatsa melawanataolo ya diintaseteri tsa dikema tsa tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo mmogo le go lepalepanya letlhomeso la melawanataolo le diphetogo tse di setseng di dirilwe mo ngwagasomeng yo o fetileng mo lekaleng len Molaotlhomo ono gape o tla netefatsa gore bajalefa ba babalesegile botoka mmogo le go rotloetsa phitlhelelo e e tokafaditsweng mo go tlamelweng ka matlole fa go iwa kwa maokelong a poraefet 13.
trg_text: Building a Better Africa and a Better World .

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse gore go tsenngwe tirisong Molaotlhomo o o Baakantsweng wa go Rwala Maikarabelo ga Puso wa 2018 kwa Palamenten Molaotlhomo ono o baakanya
trg_text: A Year of Nelson Mandela

src_text: Molao wa go Rwala Maikarabelo ga Puso wa 1957.

src_text: O tlamelana ka dikarolo tsa dituelelo mo ditopotuelong tse di diriwang kgatlhanong le Puso mabapi le fa modiredi wa puso a abelane ka tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo e e fosagetsen Seno se tla fokotsa boima jwa dituelelo tseno jo bo neng bo jarilwe ke ditekanyetsokabo tsa maokelo a pus Dipaakanyo tseno di tla oketsa metswedi ya matlole e e leng teng ga jaanong mo maokelong a porofense gore a kgone go abelana ka ditirelo tsa tlhokomelo ya boitekanel 14.
trg_text: Department of Health; and(5).

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse go phasaladiwa ga Molaotlhomo wa Naga wa Phetogo ya Maemo a Loapi wa 2018 gore baagi ba dire ditshwael Molaotlhomo ono o letlelela gore go nne le tepatepanyo ya dipholisi tse di nang le seabe mo tsibogelong ya Aforika Borwa mabapi le phetogo ya loap E tla netefatsa gore go nna le tiriso e e kwa tlase ya khabone mo nageng mmogo le ikonomi e e sa fetlhaneng le maemo a loap Eno ke kgato e nngwe gape ya tlaleletso mo matsapeng a Aforika Borwa a go tsenyatirisong Pholisi ya Naga ya Tsibogelo ya Phetogo ya Maemo a Loapi ka maitlhomo a go rotloetsa tlhabololo e e nnelang ruri le go diragatsa tshwanelo ya go nna le tikologo e e senang matsapa mo boitekanelong le mo pholong ya ditshedi, jaaka go tlhagisitswe mo Molaotheon 15.
trg_text: now known as the African Union

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse go tsenngwatirisong ga Molaotlhomo wa Dipaakanyo tsa Thulaganyo ya Bosenyi wa 2018, o o baakanyang Molao wa Thulaganyo ya Bosenyi wa 1977 go isiwa kwa Palamenten
trg_text: Thuma Mina

src_text: Molaotlhomo o o Baakantsweng ono o o tshitshinywang o tla oketsa lenaane la ditlolo tsa molao wa thobalano mo bot hot hising mme mo makgetlong a le mantsi o letlelela gore dikgetse di tlhatlhelwe le fa morago ga lobaka lo l o leele le le fetang le dingwaga di le 20.
trg_text: Office of the Premier;(2).

src_text: Dipaakanyo tseno di tsamaisana le katlholo ya kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Borwa jwa Gauteng mo tshekong ya kgetse ya Levenstei Kgetse eno e ribolotse gore Karolo ya bo 18 ya Molao wa Tsamaiso ya Dithulaganyo tsa Bosenyi wa 1977 ga o tsamaisane le Molaotheo e bile ga e a amogelesega ka ntlha ya fa e thibela, go sa kgathalesege mabaka a a leng teng, tshwanelo ya go tlhatlhela kgetse kgatlhanong le ditlolomolao tsotlhe tsa thobalano, ntle fela le tseo di tlhalositsweng mo Karolong ya bo
trg_text: of lump-sum payments
